Not enough information'''





* '''Opportunity''': There are a large and increasing number of suitably-licensed new Wikisource texts: academic papers ([[:Wikisource:Biodiversity Assessment of the Fishes of Saba Bank Atoll, Netherlands Antilles|strikingly-illustrated example on Wikisource]]). Many articles are now published under CC-BY or CC-BY-SA licenses, and with fully-machine-readable formats; initiatives like [[:w:plan S|Plan S]] will further this trend.
